title: Wang Weicheng
text:
Wang Weicheng (; born 2 September 1991 in <a href="Chongqing">Chongqing</a>) is a <a href="Chinese%20people">Chinese</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays for <a href="Chinese%20Super%20League">Chinese Super League</a> side <a href="Chongqing%20Lifan">Chongqing Lifan</a>.
Club career.
Wang Weicheng started his football career when he was promoted to <a href="Chongqing%20Lifan">Chongqing Lifan</a>'s first team in the 2010 season. On 4 May 2011, he made his senior debut in the first round of <a href="2011%20Chinese%20FA%20Cup">2011 Chinese FA Cup</a> against <a href="Beijing%20Baxy">Beijing Baxy</a>. He scored his first goal in the match, which ensured Chongqing's 3–0 home victory. Wang made his Super League debut on 6 March 2016, in a 2–1 home win against <a href="Guangzhou%20Evergrande">Guangzhou Evergrande</a>, coming on as a substitute for <a href="Fernando%20Henrique%20da%20Concei%C3%A7%C3%A3o">Fernandinho</a> in the 86th minute.
Honours.
Club.
<a href="Chongqing%20Lifan">Chongqing Lifan</a>
